text: Río Naranjo is a district of the Bagaces canton, in the Guanacaste province of Costa Rica. == History == Río Naranjo was created on 27 April 1995 by Decreto Ejecutivo 24286-G. == Geography == Río Naranjo has an area of km² and an elevation of metres. ==Villages== The town of Río Naranjo is the administrative center of the district. The only other village is Río Chiquito. == Demographics == For the 2011 census, Río Naranjo had a population of inhabitants. == Transportation == === Road transportation === The district is covered by the following road routes: *25px National Route 6 == References == Category:Districts of Guanacaste Province Category:Populated places in Guanacaste Province
title: Río Naranjo District
